thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to get the hyperlinks on a website using the 'get_hyperlinks' command.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'get_hyperlinks' command can help me get a list of all the hyperlinks on a website.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get the hyperlinks on a website.
- Specify the URL of the website to get the hyperlinks from.
- Check if the website is accessible.
- If the website is accessible, get the hyperlinks on the website.
- Output the hyperlinks to the user.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to get hyperlinks on websites that are malicious or harmful to the system.
thoughts.speak: I think it would be useful to get the hyperlinks on a website using the 'get_hyperlinks' command. Shall I proceed?
